thread.title: Fattah to Participate in Health Expo Saturday, Indian Community Outreach Event Sunday in Philadelphia
thread.title_full: Fattah to Participate in Health Expo Saturday, Indian Community Outreach Event Sunday in Philadelphia - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Fattah to Participate in Health Expo Saturday, Indian Community Outreach Event Sunday in Philadelphia
text:
Office of Congressman Chaka Fattah
WASHINGTON , Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- This weekend in Philadelphia , Congressman Chaka Fattah (PA-02) will join the community at two events; Saturday, he will participate in Radio One's "Be Healthy!" Expo, and on Sunday he will join Philadelphia's Indian community in welcoming Ambassador Dnyaneshwar M. Mulay to the region.
Saturday's health expo is designed to inform and educate Philadelphia's African American community on health issues facing minorities in the Delaware Valley. The event at Audenried Charter High School is free and open to the public. It will feature health screenings and the opportunity to meet with healthcare professionals. Congressman Fattah participated in this event last year and has long championed initiatives to increase awareness around minority health disparities; he was instrumental in the reauthorization of the Office of Minority Health, part of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services and the creation the new Office of Minority Health (OMH) at the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS), a department that was established by the Affordable Care Act.
On Sunday, Congressman Fattah will be the featured guest at the Council for Indian Organizations in Greater Philadelphia's Outreach Program. Fattah will join Ambassador Mulay, Consul General of India in New York , as a speaker at the event aimed at engaging and strengthening ties with the local Indian community in Philadelphia . Recently, Congressman Fattah welcomed Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi to the United States during a visit to the West Coast earlier this fall.
Be Healthy! Expo
WHO: Congressman Chaka Fattah
WHAT: Radio One's Be Healthy! Expo
WHEN: 10:00 – 11:00 AM , Saturday, October 24, 2015
WHERE:
Universal Audenried Charter High School
3301 Tasker Street
Philadelphia, PA 19145
Indian Community Outreach Program
WHO: Congressman Chaka Fattah
WHAT: Featured Speaker at the Council of Indian Organizations Community Outreach Program
WHEN: 5:30 – 8:30 PM , Sunday, October 25, 2015
WHERE:
Crowne Plaza Bucks County – Yardley Ballroom
4700 Street Road
Feasterville-Trevose, PA 19053
